definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Removes gently with Revlon ColorStay Eye& Lip Makeup Remover .
sentences.chinese: 卸妝時請配合使用露華濃不脫色眼脣部卸妝乳。

sentences.english: Cloud like clothes look, the spring breeze blows sill Revlon.
sentences.chinese: 雲想衣裳花想容，春風拂檻露華濃。

sentences.english: The showy peach flowers bathing in the dew.
sentences.chinese: 雲想衣裳花想容，春風拂檻露華濃。

sentences.english: The most unforgettable women in the world wear Revlon.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最令人難忘的女人都用露華濃。

sentences.english: Revlon also brought in vogue the idea of matching nail and lip color.
sentences.chinese: 露華濃也帶動指甲搭配脣色的流行風潮。

definition: to polish (a piece of writing)/to add a few finishing touches to (a piece of writing, painting etc)
chicken ribs/sth of little value or interest/sth of dubious worth that one is reluctant to give up/to be physically weak
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
